name: Five Nights At Gomank's
description:
It's night. You are lost. You have one thing you must do. Survive five nights before help comes.

Survive five nights against Gomank and the creatures that await you.

A DEEP, EXHILARATING STORY

Find out the mystery of the cult that is hunting you down and escape within five days.

NEXT GENERATION GAME

Five Nights At Gomank's is a revolutionary game in the horror genre which uses photogrammetry and a next generation engine built for next generation processors.

A IMMERSIVE SOUNDTRACK

The soundtrack to Five Nights At Gomank's is adapted for Dolby Atmos® and other various surround sound technologies.

FEARFUL GAMEPLAY

Test your skills and make it out alive within five nights unscathed.

WARNING: This game contains strong language and extreme violence.

System Requirements:

Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.

OS: 64-bit Windows 10

Minimum:

Processor:  Intel® Core™ i5 @ 3.3GHz or better, or AMD Ryzen™ 3 @ 3.1GHz or better

Memory: 8 GB RAM

Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM

DirectX: Version 11

Network: Broadband Internet connection

Storage: 1GB available storage

Recommended:

Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K or better, or AMD Ryzen™ 7 3700x or better

Memory: 8GB RAM

Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 3060/1660 / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT

DirectX: Version 12

Storage: 1GB available storage

Additional Notes: SSD highly recommended
